name: SKPhysicsJointSliding
desc: A joint that allows two physics bodies to slide along an axis.

items.name: class func joint(withBodyA: SKPhysicsBody, bodyB: SKPhysicsBody, anchor: CGPoint, axis: CGVector) -> SKPhysicsJointSliding

items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sliding joint is restricted so that the objects may only slide a finite distance from the initial anchor point.
